DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety, pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics of HL-032 after oral administration in healthy male volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: Safety, Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics Study of HL-032 in Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subjects Age(yr)between 19 and 50 Signed written informed consent Known hypersensitivity to Octreotide or hGH(human growth hormone) History of Cardiovascular, Respiratory, Renal/Genitourinary, Gastrointestinal, Neurological/Psychic, cancer Alcoholic, smokers or drug abusers Other conditions which in the opinion of the investigator preclude enrollment into the study
